edge: Loki asks his father for help, but Odin says that he has to take responsibility for his actions.
The real mask is found in a river by a dog named Otis, who belongs to Tim Avery. An aspiring animator, Tim is reluctant to accept parenthood with his wife, Tonya.
relationship between father and son, Alvey uses his powers to torment Tim who is trying to work at home
relationship between Otis and Alvey, Otis tries to get rid of Alvey using the mask's powers but fails
relationship between Loki and Alvey, Loki finds Alvey and confronts Tim for the mask
relationship between Tim and his boss Moss, Tim fails to impress Moss during a pitch and is later fired
relationship between Daniel Moss and Tim, Daniel Moss inspires Tim's cartoon idea after being invigorated by Tim's performance
relationship between Alvey and Odin, Alvey is born with the same powers as the mask which alerts Odin
object that helps Tim become the Mask and face off against Loki in a fight
